title: (x) Central Saint Martins poster font - Rockwell {Yves}
content:
please help me! apologies for the low res pic but it’s the font used on the poster behind the girl...

thank you so much!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20070805132243im_/http:/typophile.com/files/csmtype.jpg)

 [‹ (x) VISA corporate typeface - Whitney {Miguel}](http://web.archive.org/web/20070805132243/http:/typophile.com/node/19127 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Soil Behaviour - ITC Zapf Book {Lex} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070805132243/http:/typophile.com/node/19108 "Go to next forum topic")
author: aconcernedcitizen

comments.content:
It’s very hard to see details, could you ask the young lady to step to her left a little bit? ;-)

Howzabout — [Stymie XLight](http://web.archive.org/web/20070805132243/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/efscangraphic/stymie-sb/xlight/)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20070805132243im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Stymie-Xlight.png)
it’s the same one that’s on [their website](http://web.archive.org/web/20070805132243/http:/www.csm.arts.ac.uk/). can’t say which font it is, but at least that’ll give you all a better view of it.
That’s much clearer — this is Rockwell.
